name: Xargon Remake Ep.3
description:
Xargon Remake Ep.3 is a run and gun 2d action platformer where the player advances through a game map by completing levels. Each level has its unique nonlinear layout, where the player must explore and find door keys and artifacts for progression, as well as new enemies, item pickups and different power-ups.

This is a remake of the classic 1993 DOS video game Xargon, developed by Epic Megagames, under the supervision of Allen Pilgrim. The original game has three episodes, this version is a remake of the third episode.

Key Features:


  • The graphics in each level layout, from the original game, have been replaced with new assets and textures.
  • All enemies' sprites from the original game are enhanced and upscaled, as well as new enemies and bosses are introduced.
  • New captivating music tracks are introduced for some stages in the game.
